title: American Southwest Pumpkin Soup
ingredients: ['1 large onion, chopped', '1 carrot, chopped', '500g chicken breast, cut into pieces', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '3 sticks celery, chopped', '1 small red pepper cut into pieces', '750g pureed pumpkin', '450ml chicken stock', '125ml soured cream', '1 (470g) tin hominy, drained', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon cumin', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
